add_ramp.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                ADD_RAMP
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision: 1.0
00006 !
00007 !  Add ramp region to front of profile
00008 ! 
00009 ! ==============================================
00010 
00011 subroutine add_ramp(d_layer)
00012 
00013     use physvars
00014     use treevars
00015     use utils
00016 
00017     implicit none
00018 
00019     real, intent(in) :: d_layer
00020     integer              :: i, j, ierr
00021     integer              :: idum, iseed1, iseed2, iseed3, i1, n1,p, k, nramp, nx, ny
00022     real                 :: qtot, qramp, s, xi, xedge, rind
00023 
00024     
00025 ! Transform particles in layer at front of target
00026 ! to form exponential density ramp
00027 
00028     qtot = rho0*d_layer ! total line density
00029     s = lolam*(1-rho_min)  ! required layer thickness for stretching
00030     qramp = rho0*s
00031     nramp = npart*s/d_layer
00032     xedge = plasma_centre(1)-d_layer/2.  ! leading edge (slab & disc)
00033 
00034     do i=1,npp
00035        if (x(i).le.xedge+s) then
00036           rind = (x(i)-xedge)/s  ! fractional index ~ i/nramp
00037           xi = -lolam*log(1. - rind*(1.-rho_min))
00038           x(i) = xedge+s - xi   ! transform coordinate out into vacuum
00039        endif
00040     end do
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 end subroutine add_ramp
00045
